author: chris2_2_2
content:
Is there anything that goes in depth into ethereums early history? Specifically I'm curious whether geth launched with olympic/frontier and was spun off later or if there existed a predecessor?

Lots of material on the common history but I can't find much on the technical history.

author: wackerow
content:
Hey folks! With the merge approaching, I'm sure everyone is busy, but wanted to post a link to the PR and preview for the "post-merge" content updates we're bringing to ethereum.org. Any eyes on this would be appreciated.

There are a lot of changes, so if you only have time for laying eyes on a couple pages, the `/upgrades/merge` page specifically would probably be where I'd suggest (or also maybe the `/energy-consumption page`)

Preview: https://build-eae1f9b7-2544-4fb3-9d3f-abe2b5e5c4e7.gtsb.io/en/upgrades/merge
PR: https://github.com/ethereum/ethereum-org-website/pull/7190

Cheer and happy merge week!
